member.name: ITranscodeImage.TranscodeImage
member.summary: Converts an image to JPEG or bitmap (BMP) image format.
member.param: The Shell Item for the image to convert.
The requested height in pixels. Should be less than or equal to the actual height of the original image. See Remarks.
The requested width in pixels. Should be less than or equal to the actual width of the original image. See Remarks.

param.name: flags
param.para: Convert the image to BMP format.
Convert the image to JPEG format.

member.param: A stream to receive the converted image. The stream must be created by the calling code prior to calling TranscodeImage.
The actual width of the converted image.
The actual height of the converted image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITranscodeImage
member.summary: Exposes a method that allows conversion to JPEG or bitmap (BMP) image formats from any image type supported by Windows.
